publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1273# Mr Duncan McNeil: Compensation for Mesothelioma Sufferers—That the Parliament notes the plight of shipyard workers and their families who were exposed to asbestos, became ill and have now contracted mesothelioma; expresses concern over the length of time their compensation cases are taking to reach conclusion and the use of so-called "blanket denials" by the defendants, and notes that this practice victimises and denies justice to these cancer sufferers.

S1M-1273# Compensation for Mesothelioma Sufferers (lodged on 24 October 2000) Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Malcolm Chisholm*, Cathie Craigie*, Elaine Thomson*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Phil Gallie*, Janis Hughes*
S1M-1273# Compensation for Mesothelioma Sufferers (lodged on 24 October 2000) John Scott*, Mike Watson*, Scott Barrie*, Shona Robison*, Margaret Jamieson*, Hugh Henry*, Alex Neil*

S1M-1273# Mr Duncan McNeil: Compensation for Mesothelioma Sufferers—That the Parliament notes the plight of shipyard workers and their families who were exposed to asbestos, became ill and have now contracted mesothelioma; expresses concern over the length of time their compensation cases are taking to reach conclusion and the use of so-called "blanket denials" by the defenders, and notes that this practice victimises and denies justice to these cancer sufferers. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Malcolm Chisholm, Cathie Craigie, Elaine Thomson, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Phil Gallie, Janis Hughes, John Scott, Mike Watson, Scott Barrie, Shona Robison, Margaret Jamieson, Hugh Henry, Alex Neil, Mr Keith Harding*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-1273# Compensation for Mesothelioma Sufferers (lodged on 24 October 2000) Dorothy-Grace Elder*
S1M-1273# Compensation for Mesothelioma Sufferers (lodged on 24 October 2000) Irene McGugan*, Michael Russell*, Christine Grahame*
S1M-1273# Compensation for Mesothelioma Sufferers (lodged on 24 October 2000) Brian Adam*, Fiona McLeod*, Andrew Wilson*, David Mundell*

S1M-1273# Compensation for Mesothelioma Sufferers (lodged on 24 October 2000) Dr Elaine Murray*, Nora Radcliffe*, Michael Matheson*, Mr John Home Robertson*, Ms Sandra White*, Nick Johnston*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Trish Godman*

S1M-1273# Mr Duncan McNeil: Compensation for Mesothelioma Sufferers—That the Parliament notes the plight of shipyard workers and their families who were exposed to asbestos, became ill and have now contracted mesothelioma; expresses concern over the length of time their compensation cases are taking to reach conclusion and the use of so-called "blanket denials" by the defenders, and notes that this practice victimises and denies justice to these cancer sufferers. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Malcolm Chisholm, Cathie Craigie, Elaine Thomson, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Phil Gallie, Janis Hughes, John Scott, Mike Watson, Scott Barrie, Shona Robison, Margaret Jamieson, Hugh Henry, Alex Neil, Mr Keith Harding, Tommy Sheridan, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Irene McGugan, Michael Russell, Christine Grahame, Brian Adam, Fiona McLeod, Andrew Wilson, David Mundell, Dr Elaine Murray, Nora Radcliffe, Michael Matheson, Mr John Home Robertson, Ms Sandra White, Nick Johnston, Dr Richard Simpson, Trish Godman, Donald Gorrie*
S1M-1273# Compensation for Mesothelioma Sufferers (lodged on 24 October 2000) Mr Michael McMahon*
S1M-1273# Compensation for Mesothelioma Sufferers (lodged on 24 October 2000) Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Tricia Marwick*, Cathy Jamieson*, Mr David Davidson*

S1M-1273# Compensation for Mesothelioma Sufferers (lodged on 24 October 2000) Mr Gil Paterson*

S1M-1273# Mr Duncan McNeil: Compensation for Mesothelioma Sufferers-That the Parliament notes the plight of shipyard workers and their families who were exposed to asbestos, became ill and have now contracted mesothelioma; expresses concern over the length of time their compensation cases are taking to reach conclusion and the use of so-called "blanket denials" by the defenders, and notes that this practice victimises and denies justice to these cancer sufferers. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Malcolm Chisholm, Cathie Craigie, Elaine Thomson, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Phil Gallie, Janis Hughes, John Scott, Mike Watson, Scott Barrie, Shona Robison, Margaret Jamieson, Hugh Henry, Alex Neil, Mr Keith Harding, Tommy Sheridan, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Irene McGugan, Michael Russell, Christine Grahame, Brian Adam, Fiona McLeod, Andrew Wilson, David Mundell, Dr Elaine Murray, Nora Radcliffe, Michael Matheson, Mr John Home Robertson, Ms Sandra White, Nick Johnston, Dr Richard Simpson, Trish Godman, Donald Gorrie, Mr Michael McMahon, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Mr Brian Monteith, Tricia Marwick, Cathy Jamieson, Mr David Davidson, Pauline McNeill, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Mr Gil Paterson
S1M-1273# Compensation for Mesothelioma Sufferers (lodged on 24 October 2000) Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Marilyn Livingstone*
